text: I have attended a few yoga classes with Lou and love her teaching. Gave SUP yoga a try and enjoyed it so much even though I don't like to be under the sun. It is an activity for friends, family and couple, challenging and fun. My friends and I enjoyed the class and would try again!

SUP Yoga was such a fun and refreshing experience. Balancing on the board made the poses more challenging, but also more rewarding. The calm water and fresh air made it feel super relaxing. Definitely a unique way to enjoy yoga—I’d do it again for sure!

Learning to swim with Lou has been such an enjoyable journey! What began as a skill I wanted to master has turned into something I truly look forward to each week.

Lou’s teaching style is not only effective but also fun and motivating. I’ve made so much progress with her guidance, and I’m excited to continue learning new swimming styles. If you’re looking for a coach who makes the process enjoyable while helping you improve, Lou is the one!

I had the most amazing experience at the Yoga SUP session at Lazarus Sea Sports Centre! The whole experience was so zen, and Trainer Lou’s calming voice made the session feel incredibly peaceful. She guided us through each movement with such ease that we completely forgot we were doing yoga on a SUP board! It was a truly unique and relaxing way to connect with nature. Honestly, I can't wait to go back again! Highly recommend this experience to anyone looking for a fun and mindful activity.

I had an amazing yoga and SUP yoga session with Lou. Her patience, calm demeanor, deep knowledge, and passion for the practice made the experience truly enjoyable. During the session, I felt relaxed and at peace, and afterward, I felt completely rejuvenated. Lou is an outstanding instructor—I highly recommend her!
